title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he is able to successfully perform an inception, planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces a new enemy, the Joker, who wants to plunge Gotham City into anarchy and chaos.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man's identity is exposed, and he seeks the help of Doctor Strange to make the world forget who he is.

title: Dune
description: A young nobleman becomes embroiled in a war over a valuable spice on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
description: Neo lives a seemingly normal life until he is pulled back into the Matrix and has to confront his past once again.
